ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED Description:Rare vintage USSR Russian mechanical wristwatch Poljot 1945-1975. The watch in fully working order – you can use it for everyday wearing; or if you are collector Poljot watch will be super addition to your collection - the price of this watch increases every year. It has a gold Au10 plated case with hand winding crown and back stainless steel cover, face glass made of plastic. The movement - mechanical, with autowinding - super quality. There is a lettering on the back cover: “To dear father from Lyuba and Misha. 1975”. This Poljot watch is used but are in good working and cosmetic condition as seen on the images below. This watchhas been serviced. Watchband is added as a gift. Our goal is to make sure you are a happy buyer and you really pleasant from shopping at our store.
